message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with computer vision and machine learning techniques for intrinsic image decomposition, which is a classic problem in computer vision. The paper proposes a new approach using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for direct intrinsics learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also extensively discusses the use of synthetic training data and the generalization of the proposed method across modalities, indicating a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG and cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of graph-based inference algorithms, which falls under the sub-category of computer graphics (cs.GR). Finally, the paper discusses the results on both synthetic and real images, indicating a focus on multimedia (cs.MM).
